modName: Virile ENB - A Realistic Fantasy ENB - Resurrected
summary:
Virile ENB by Andrewattack
______________________________
Looking for something different, as well as unique, without overkill bloom or crazy effects ? Look no further...Virile is the best way to describe this Enb preset. Powerful, realistic, and vibrant. I hope you like the preset as much as I did!
descriptionHtml:
[size= 5]Go to my new work :
Virile ENB - The Finale
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27334/

[/size]
[IMG]http://i1174.photobucket.com/albums/r614/Kai_Soi/VirileENB23.png[/IMG]

[color=grey] [size=16]_________________________________________________________________________________________[/size] [/color]

[color=red] [size=12]-Description-[/size] [/color]


[color=white] [size=4]Virile is the best way to describe this ENB preset. Powerful, realistic, and vibrant. A great attention to small things, like lighting and bloom which rival some of the most visually stunning games, make this ENB among the best.  I hope you enjoy the preset as much as I did! A great visual enhancer! [/size] [/color]

[color=grey] [size=16]_________________________________________________________________________________________[/size] [/color]

[color=red][size=12]-Installation-[/color][/size] 

Open the \"rar\" file you downloaded, copy or highlight the files in the \"v1.0 file\", and copy them to (C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim). After you have done that, open the \"Data\" folder, and move the \"light123\" file to the Data file.

[color=grey] [size=16]_________________________________________________________________________________________[/size] [/color]

[color=red] [size=12]-This ENB includes as follows-[/size] [/color] 


- Detailed Shadows

- Photo-realistic Faces and Features

- Light Dof

- Realistic Fire, Smoke, and Embers

- Tweaked Bloom (for fires, light and such)

- Sun Rays

- HDR

- SSAO (Disable if you have perfomance issues)

[color=grey] [size=16]_________________________________________________________________________________________[/size] [/color]

[color=red] [size=12] -Troubleshooting-[/size] [/color]

If you have any issues, please relay them to me in the chat. There have not been any so far.

[color=grey] [size=16]_________________________________________________________________________________________[/size] [/color]

[color=white] [size=4]Make sure to download the DLL  required for all ENBs [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0119.htm]--HERE--[/url][/size] [/color].

[color=grey] [size=16]_________________________________________________________________________________________[/size] [/color]
[color=red] [size=12] -My Specs-[/size] [/color]

Motherboard: P8Z68-V

CPU: i5 2500k (3.8 Ghz)

GPU: GTX 560 Ti MSI Twin Frozr II OC

RAM: G-Skill Sniper 1600 8GB 1.5V

SSD: Crucial C300 64GB

HDD: WD Green 1TB

CPU Cooler: Corsair A70

PSU: OCZ ModXStream 750W

Fan Control: NZXT Sentry Mesh

Case: NZXT Tempest 410 Elite

OS: Windows 7 Ultimate 64bit

FPS: 45-50

Would recommend a fast comp that could play Skyrim at High or medium settings.

[color=black] [size=16]____________________________________________________________________________[/size] [/color]
